faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the Sanskrit + Darshan + Upanishad bundle.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete the entire bundle?
questions.answer: The bundle is self-paced and typically takes 6-8 months to complete all courses with regular study.

questions.question: Do I need prior knowledge of Sanskrit?
questions.answer: No prior knowledge is required. The Sanskrit course starts from basics and takes you to advanced level.

questions.question: Can I take individual courses instead of the bundle?
questions.answer: Yes, all courses are available individually, but the bundle offers significant savings and a structured learning path.

questions.question: Will I get certificates for each course?
questions.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate of completion for each course and a master certificate for completing the entire bundle.
